TopicTitle: Petition for Planes Of Fame Air Museum

Articles.Content:
https://www.change.org/p/planes-of-fame-air-museum-don-t-let-them-stop-our-air-show?utm_medium=email&utm_source=notification&utm_campaign=petition_signer_receipt_rmp&share_context=signature_receipt&recruiter=88385020

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxzlhNxozKg&feature=player_embedded

I personally haven't heard of it before, but what these people are doing to a non-profit organization, its pretty messed up. I also know that there are quite a lot of aircraft enthusiasts out there that might care about this, closes the 4th if memory proves correct. Only 1,000 left, last time I checked. I'm not that good at ending things so I'll just stop typing now...

@Spacetraindriver There is no indication of what the petition is against at all in the text, other than a lawsuit. Having to watch a youtube video is kooky, the petition should say WHY the airshow is in trouble.

Signed it.
